translations: 竭力增补；勉强维持；竭力维持

phrs.translation: v. 竭力维持；弥补…的不足

sentences.sentence: She managed to eke out her student loan till the end of the year.
sentences.translation: 她想方设法节约用钱使学生贷款维持到了年底。

sentences.sentence: That forced peasant farmers to try to eke a living off steep hillsides.
sentences.translation: 那迫使农民要靠在陡峭的山坡上来勉强维持生计。

sentences.sentence: They are a team that always seemed to eke out victory when the going got tough.
sentences.translation: 看起来他们总是一个能在困难中艰难取胜的团队。
